author: Erik Lorincz
description: Lime green in colour under a frothy head, lemon fresh and botanical with gin, basil and a hint of celery.
name: Green Park
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly MUDDLE basil in base of shaker (just to bruise)
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass

video.description: Lime green in colour under a frothy head, lemon fresh and botanical with gin, basil and a hint of celery.
video.name: HOWTO make Green Park
